text: The Social Convergence (, CS) is a left-wing political party in Chile. It is led by Gabriel Boric. It was founded in 2018 by the Autonomist Movement (MA), Libertarian Left (IL), Socialism and Freedom (SOL) and New Democracy (ND). It is part of the leftist coalition Broad Front. In mid-2019, members of the movement began their process to register as a legally constituted political party. ==References== Category:21st-century establishments in Chile Category:2010s establishments in South America Category:2018 establishments Category:Political parties in Chile
title: Social Convergence
